text: <!channel> Any recommendations for bball shoes, preferably not too expensive and for wider feet. My shins and ankles have been hurting after the last couple sessions so it think it's time to pony up and buy some actual bball shoes.
i love lebron's soldier line...lots of high tops and ankle support. i used to roll my ankles a lot before i started wearing these
I have wide feet too and these have also been really great for my ankles. they're pretty cheap! <https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00JDO8R5O/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o04_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1>
<@U1MPXSHN1> plus we could be matching if you get them in black
<@U1L3PU7BJ> <@U1MPXSHN1> all three of us could match

<@U1KSR1MS4> <@U1L3PU7BJ> - Ha ha, thanks for the input - I'm all about matching :grinning: Will they stretch a little on the sides to accomdate wider feet? They only have size D available and my feet are a little wider than that
I have size D as well. They're wider than a typical basketball shoe and fits to my foot pretty well. I can bring them in on Monday if you want to take a look at them
